about_the_game:
Disease Z is a survival game in a Post-Apocalyptic world, which takes place 6 years after a supposed "flu" spread across the continent transforming almost all humans and animals in zombies.
City Z was the most affected, as it is a huge and central city on the continent, most cases of "flu" went to hospitals in the city.


Explore the open world of Disease Z solo, collecting materials, building base, hunting and fighting to survive. Be careful with nature as it has taken over the city and be even more careful with the sunset.

Climate System


Weather system, with rain, cloudy, snow and even sunny day and day and night. Beware of nightfall, enemies get stronger and in places you least expect.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Construction


Building mode, it's the best way to escape the weather and hide in the middle of the night.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hunting


Without food you will end up dying easily, a roast beef is a great remedy for an empty stomach

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Harvest


Your life is based on hunger and thirst, without food you will die, without water you will also die. But like everything in life, everything that is good lasts little, this is a limited resource.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Explore an open world


A 10 km² map, with forests, mountains, cities and much more.


  • Explorable Locations
There are places where the items are great, but at a price for it, Hospitals for example can be a great place to get Medkit, but always remember there is a price.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game does not contain explicit nudity scenes. The character is only in his underwear if he removes all clothing and equipment.
The act of violence that exists is to kill the "enemies" that are the living dead called zombies with firearms and melee weapons.

name: Disease Z - Zombie City Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB or AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Though not required, SSD for storage and 16 GB of memory is recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Though not required, SSD for storage is recommended

short_description: On January 14, 2024, what we thought was the common flu turned into something terrible. It's been 6 years since then. You are the last survivor of Z City. Create, Build, Hunt and try to survive in a post-apocalyptic environment.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
